title: Technology-Integrated Inquiry Learning Module: Strengthening Scientific Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts and experience using digital tools
context.additional_context: Science-based problem-solving education for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields. Integrated online-offline learning in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can systematically generate science inquiry questions (Questioning) using technological tools.
Learners can demonstrate modeling (Modeling) skills to address environmental issues using data analysis tools and simulation programs.
Learners can establish inquiry plans (Planning) reflecting peer feedback through digital collaboration platforms.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
